Material used.Description: Protein levels were measured in fibroblasts derived from patients carrying the variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein levels of OPA1 were reduced by approximately 60% in fibroblasts derived from patients carrying the variant compared to healthy controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: A control cDNA construct lacking the mutation was used for positive validation.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein levels above 100% relative to controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein levels below 100% relative to controls.
